title: iban
description: The IBAN Object represents properties associated with International Bank Account Numbers (IBANs) for extension-definition--349c1029-4052-4635-a064-263cb17290ea

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `iban`.

number.description: Specifies the full IBAN, including 2 digit country code.

country_code.description: The two digit IBAN Country Code
